product_name: NEMO Obi 3 Pawprint Tent Liner - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The NEMO Obi 3P Pawprint(TM) is a removable liner for the inside of your Obi 3P tent. It has the dual function of protecting your tent floor from boots and paws, and of adding serious comfort. Obi Pawprint is made of a machine washable brushed fabric that is soft to the touch. Place sleeping pads between the Pawprint liner and tent floor to help them stay in place. With a clean, soft NEMO Obi 3P Pawprint below you, you might be able to save some weight and travel with a lighter sleeping bag or just a blanket. Closeout.
short_description: The NEMO Obi 3P Pawprint(TM) is a removable liner for the inside of your Obi 3P tent. It has the dual function of protecting your tent floor from boots and paws, and of adding serious comfort.
